balanceOf(address).intent: Displays the number of WETH held by the specified address.

transfer(address,uint256).intent: Sends a specified amount of WETH from your wallet to another address.

approve(address,uint256).intent: Authorizes another address to spend a specified amount of your WETH on your behalf.

allowance(address,address).intent: Checks the remaining amount of WETH that the spender is permitted to spend from the owner's balance.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).intent: Transfers a specified amount of WETH from one address to another.

distributeRewards(uint256,uint256,addres.intent: Send project rewards to recipients for a specific month (only callable by the projectâ€™s distributor).

claimRewards(uint256[],uint256).intent: Claim your unclaimed rewards for specified projects up to a given month.

setClaimExecutors(address[]).intent: Replace current executors with new ones for managing reward claims.

withdraw(uint128,bool).intent: Withdraw tokens from your RNat account to your main address. Optionally wrap them in WNat.

withdrawAll(bool).intent: Withdraw all available tokens from RNat. Locked tokens are penalized by burning half.

transferExternalToken(address,uint256).intent: Move non-WNat ERC-20 tokens sent to your RNat account back to your main account.

getRNatAccount(address).intent: Get your associated RNat account address.

getProjectInfo(uint256).intent: View full details about a specific project, including reward and claim statuses.

getProjectRewardsInfo(uint256,uint256).intent: View monthly reward details for a specific project.

getOwnerRewardsInfo(uint256,uint256,addr.intent: View monthly reward status for a specific project and wallet.

getClaimableRewards(uint256,address).intent: View how much reward a specific address can currently claim for a project.

getBalancesOf(address).intent: View your RNat, WNat, and locked token balances.
